title: Client keeps on rerolling to the earlier patch
body: Happened thrice now, starting the client and receiving a pop message "League is restored to it's previous patch" and it asks for an update which is 207 mb each time. Unfortunately i don't have the best internet, hence it usually takes 10/15 mins to  patch up. Why is this happening again and again?

replies.body: Sounds like some of those patch files might not be installing correctly. Try running a quick repair after it patches, but if it still keeps trying to update then grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with a  **force repatch**.

This never happened before and has recently started after the urgot patch came online. Everyday i have to experience this same thing again and again. It starts with disabling the play button and displaying a message; "you're unable to play because you're offline". Then i restart my client and it downloads the same patch again[](http://prntscr.com/g2tjb9)
